Articles.Content:
Every time I try to enable RCS or SAS it enables for a few seconds then disables again. Restarting KSP didn't solve the problem. I don't think it is caused by an autopilot because I have tried it with all autopilots off.

For some reason this problem does not affect my vtol plane (or attempt at one) once parts have fallen off it.

It isn't caused by advanced fly by wire (which was my first theory) because the problem is still there when I uninstall it.

I use CKAN and the mods below.
